vocabinfos.mediumDef:
luxury, dainty, delight, finery
§ luxury, dainty, delight, finery
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 奢侈品, 精美的東西, 喜樂
2) (性的)歡悅 (創18:12)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
1) 奢侈品, 精美的东西, 喜乐
2) (性的)欢悦 (创18:12)
